samples.context: Common Diseases and Prevention Steps Typhoid Headache and fever which remains high in the second week and then declines Proper hygiene in surrounding areas of living.

samples.context: Common Diseases and Prevention Steps Maintenance of hygienic conditions in community. Preventing the mosquito breeding sites.
